inclusion.criterion: Males greater than or equal to 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Prior enrollment in NCI protocol 09-C-0139 with receipt of at least 5 doses of TARP peptide vaccine
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Performance Status: ECOG 0-1, life expectancy of greater than or equal to 1 year
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin greater than or equal to 10.0 gm/dL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: WBC greater than or equal to 2,500/mm3
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ALC greater than or equal to 500/mm3
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ANC greater than or equal to 1,000/mm3
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: platelet count greater than or equal to 100,000/mm3
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: PT/PTT less than or equal to 1.5X ULN unless receiving clinically indicated anticoagulant therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: SGOT/SGPT less than or equal to 2.5X ULN, total bilirubin less than or equal to 1.5X ULN, Cr less than or equal to 1.5X ULN, estimated GFR (eGFR) greater than or equal to 60 ml/min
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hepatitis B and C negative, unless the result is consistent with prior vaccination or prior infection with full recovery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with active infection or other significant or uncontrolled medical illness
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients on immunosuppressive therapy including systemic corticosteroid therapy for any reason
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 55 year old man with lower urinary tract symptoms. He has a history of prostate cancer and is currently receiving standard of care medical management.
